mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from noticeBoard
mapper.insert: insert into noticeReplyBoard(memberId, content, bno, nickName, refOrder, step) values (#{memberId}, #{content}, #{bno}, #{nickName}, #{refOrder}, #{step})
insert into noticeReplyBoard(memberId, content, bno, nickName, refOrder, step) values (#{memberId}, #{content}, #{bno}, #{nickName}, #{refOrder} + 1, #{step} + 1)
mapper.select: select * from noticeReplyBoard where bno = #{bno} order by ref desc, refOrder asc
